title: Level 6 & Level 7 Champion Masteries
body:
When are the Level 6 & Level 7 Champion Masteries coming out?. 

We know that it will take
11,400 Champion Points to reach level 6, meaning you are going to need 33,000 Champion Points total to reach Level 6.
and
13,800 Champion Points to reach level 7, meaning you will need 46,800 Champion Points total to reach Level 7.

Discuss...

replies.body: I imagine they'll either come out by the end of s5 or early s6

Wait only 50k? does that mean im champ level 28 on singed on my main account? (i have a little over 200k experience)

This also means im level 7 on like 5 champs already on this account.

They really need to release a fuck load of more levels, i can level a champ to level 5 in a day or two from buying them.
Where'd you get these pictures in the first place?
got them from reddit and Photo shopped them onto my Masteries
